source.class:
Do not cache instances of this class! The methods {@linkplain BigAggregator#getCollection()},{@linkplain ComplexAggregator#getCollection()} and {@linkplain PrimitiveAggregator#getCollection()}return threadlocal instances, and when you access the individual aggregators they are {@linkplain AggregatorFunction#reset()} for you.
